title: Blu3Whale ED
headline: Why everyone needs Nagre
searchDescription: Why wonder when you can get one
aiDescription: Ever since I learned how to program, my life’s purpose has been to use my technical expertise to transform the environments around me. This mission is deeply reflected in my career journey. Since the age of 21, I’ve worked with startups and tech companies in the United States, developing innovative solutions to address local and global issues. My technical and project management skills, combined with my design-thinking approach, have enabled me to consistently exceed expectations and deliver impactful results.

In every role, I’ve sought unique opportunities to rise above challenges and push the boundaries of what’s possible. At Arcurve, I pitched and developed a recruitment feature with the potential to become a critical data-collection asset. Currently, in Saviynt, I am working on the implementation process as well as fixing bugs in the product. I also have exposure to working with the backend architecture of microservices. I’ve been deeply involved in achieving major product milestones, including deploying our platform via AWS and integrating API services.

While my technical experiences are vast, I deeply value opportunities to broaden my exposure to the challenges and perspectives of diverse communities worldwide. I am seeking unique opportunities to apply my skills in software, project management, and design thinking to improve lives while broadening my understanding of how people around the world navigate and overcome challenges.
